title: Housing funds for Puerto Ricans who fled Hurricane Maria must end: U.S. judge
cleanedCompare: thousand puerto rican families fled hurricane maria weeks us-funded housing hotels motels country fend federal judge ruled thursday funds ricans end

metadata.title: Housing funds for Puerto Ricans who fled Hurricane Maria must end: U.S. judge | Reuters
metadata.description: More than a thousand Puerto Rican families who fled Hurricane Maria will get two more weeks of U.S.-funded housing in hotels and motels across the country but will then need to fend for themselves, a federal judge ruled on Thursday.

title: Detroit schools shut off drinking water
cleanedCompare: drinking water shut detroit public schools found high levels lead copper detroit's superintendent turning tests performed aug

metadata.title: Detroit schools shut off drinking water
metadata.description: Drinking water is being shut off at all Detroit public schools because the water in 16 of them was found to have high levels of lead or copper. Detroit's superintendent said that he's turning off water at all schools while tests are performed. (Aug. 30)
metadata.ogTitle: Detroit schools shut off drinking water
metadata.ogDescription: Drinking water is being shut off at all Detroit public schools because the water in 16 of them was found to have high levels of lead or copper. Detroit's superintendent said that he's turning off water at all schools while tests are performed. (Aug. 30)
